scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf ios/Pods ios/build ios/Podfile.lock && rm -rf macos/Pods macos/build macos/Podfile.lock && rm -rf android/app/build android/build android/.gradle && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:cache: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all 2>/dev/null || true && npx react-native start --reset-cache
scripts.clean:deep: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.clean:macos: rm -rf macos/Pods macos/build macos/Podfile.lock macos/LottieViewer.xcworkspace/xcuserdata macos/LottieViewer.xcodeproj/xcuserdata macos/DerivedData 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build: npm install && cd ios && pod install && cd ../macos && pod install && cd ..
scripts.build:ios: npm install && cd ios && pod install
scripts.build:macos: npm install && cd macos && pod install
scripts.clean:build:macos: npm run clean:macos && npm run build:macos
